pkgmetadata.longdescription: Policy Learning // Package for evaluating user-specified finite stage policies and learning optimal treatment policies via doubly robust loss functions. Policy learning methods include doubly robust learning of the blip/conditional average treatment effect and sequential policy tree learning. The package also include methods for optimal subgroup analysis. See Nordland and Holst (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2212.02335 for documentation and references.
